name: SoundCloud 2021 - The new SoundCloud
description: The new SoundCloud. This style has major improvements for the website, such as colour bleeding animations from lights to darks, header image colour enhancements, ALL NEW WAVE FORMS - different waveforms and glowing scrubber/seek effects for playlists, singles and albums, new menu options, rearranged timeline and play areas, improved shuffle, loop and mixer switches, rearranged home page, stream and profiles to show crisper header images, FULLY POLISHED STYLE AND WEBSITE REDESIGN!
